short_description: hilti north america corporate office is a fastener supplier based in plano, texas, united states.
long_description: hilti is a world-leading provider of high quality, innovative and specialized tools, fastening systems and software-based solutions for the professional construction user. with more than 3,800 highly trained hilti account managers, engineers, and hilti employees throughout north america, hilti expertise covers the areas of powder actuated fastening, drilling and demolition, diamond coring and cutting, measuring, firestopping, screw fastening, adhesive and mechanical anchoring, strut and hanger systems, solutions for tool park productivity as well as worker health and safety.
